content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions, but I can provide information on the topic. Spain's mountainous terrain helped in providing shelter and hindered its ability to defend against invasion over the ages. Spain's terrain played a strategic role in its history, as the mountains provided natural barriers against invading armies. The rugged terrain also offered refuge for resistance fighters during wars and other conflicts. However, the mountains also made it difficult for the country to maintain effective communication and transportation, which made it harder to defend against invasion.
